title: Blonde 5"10 Silver II ADC/SUPPORT looking for open ladder team
body:
If you're looking for a proper pleb support i'm not for you, if you want an ADC that runs proper early game runes the same applies. 
However one glance at my stats for these roles shows my builds are legit. Preferred champs for support include thresh, I am second to none on the chainz, morgana (ezmode), and malphite. My adc pool consists of caitlyn, jinx, kalista, and lucian. However my limited mechanical ability on other adc's are compensated for by my runes which ensure I can outcrit them, thus negating any need for mechanics. Recruit me and we will go far.

replies.body: Oi im bronze 3 and I joined main mid
